# pxmake

## Overview

‘pxmake’ is an R package for creating and modifying PX-files.

With pxmake you can:

- Import a PX-file, modify it, and save it as a new PX-file.
- Modify all metadata keywords in a PX-file.
- Do complex modifications to a PX-file, like adding total levels to a
  variable.
- Save a PX-file as an Excel workbook.

## Installation

``` r
# Install the latest release from CRAN
install.packages('pxmake')

# Or the development version from GitHub
# install.packages('pak')
pak::pak("StatisticsGreenland/pxmake")
```

## How to use

*(Find complete documentation on [pxmake
webpage](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/).)*

Use
[`px()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px.md)
to import an existing PX-file into R.

``` r
library(pxmake)

# Import PX-file
x <- px(input = "example.px")
```

Once imported, use one of pxmake’s *modifying functions*.

In general, modifying functions are named after the keyword they modify.
It’s possible to chain multiple modifying functions together in
tidyverse style by using the pipe operator `%>%`.

``` r
library(magrittr) # import pipe

# Create px object from data frame
x <- px(data.frame(year = as.character(rep(2021:2023, each = 3)), 
                   group = c('a', 'b', 'c'), 
                   value = runif(9)
                   )
        ) 

head(x$data, 4)
#> # A tibble: 4 × 3
#>   year  group value
#>   <chr> <chr> <dbl>
#> 1 2021  a     0.266
#> 2 2021  b     0.372
#> 3 2021  c     0.573
#> 4 2022  a     0.908

x %>% 
  px_timeval("year") %>%  # Set year as TIMEVAL
  px_heading("year") %>%  # Set year as HEADING
  px_stub("group") %>%    # Set group as STUB
  px_decimals("2") %>%    # Set DECIMALS to 2
  px_save("example.px") # Save as PX-file
```

### Modifying functions

Currently the following 49 keywords have a modifying function in pxmake:

``` R
#>  Keyword            Function name        
#>  AGGREGALLOWED      px_aggregallowed     
#>  AUTOPEN            px_autopen           
#>  AXIS-VERSION       px_axis_version      
#>  BASEPERIOD         px_baseperiod        
#>  CELLNOTE           px_cellnote          
#>  CELLNOTEX          px_cellnotex         
#>  CFPRICES           px_cfprices          
#>  CHARSET            px_charset           
#>  CODEPAGE           px_codepage          
#>  CONFIDENTIAL       px_confidential      
#>  CONTACT            px_contact           
#>  CONTENTS           px_contents          
#>  CONTVARIABLE       px_contvariable      
#>  COPYRIGHT          px_copyright         
#>  CREATION-DATE      px_creation_date     
#>  DATA               px_data              
#>  DECIMALS           px_decimals          
#>  DESCRIPTION        px_description       
#>  DESCRIPTIONDEFAULT px_descriptiondefault
#>  DOMAIN             px_domain            
#>  ELIMINATION        px_elimination       
#>  HEADING            px_heading           
#>  INFOFILE           px_infofile          
#>  LANGUAGE           px_language          
#>  LANGUAGES          px_languages         
#>  LAST-UPDATED       px_last_updated      
#>  LINK               px_link              
#>  MAP                px_map               
#>  MATRIX             px_matrix            
#>  NEXT-UPDATE        px_next_update       
#>  NOTE               px_note              
#>  NOTEX              px_notex             
#>  PRECISION          px_precision         
#>  SHOWDECIMALS       px_showdecimals      
#>  SOURCE             px_source            
#>  STOCKFA            px_stockfa           
#>  STUB               px_stub              
#>  SUBJECT-AREA       px_subject_area      
#>  SUBJECT-CODE       px_subject_code      
#>  TABLEID            px_tableid           
#>  TIMEVAL            px_timeval           
#>  TITLE              px_title             
#>  UNITS              px_units             
#>  UPDATE-FREQUENCY   px_update_frequency  
#>  VALUENOTE          px_valuenote         
#>  VALUENOTEX         px_valuenotex        
#>  VALUES             px_values            
#>  VARIABLE-LABEL     px_variable_label    
#>  VARIABLE-TYPE      px_variable_type
```

In addition to the above, the following 3 modifying functions are
available:

``` R
#>  Function name
#>  px_add_totals
#>  px_figures   
#>  px_order
```

See the help page for each modifying function for more information.

Keywords without modifying functions

These 36 keywords currently doesn’t have a modifying function, but can
be implemented.

``` R
#>  Keyword             Function name          Priority Complexity
#>  ATTRIBUTE-ID        px_attribute_id                           
#>  ATTRIBUTE-TEXT      px_attribute_text                         
#>  ATTRIBUTES          px_attributes                             
#>  DATABASE            px_database                               
#>  DATANOTE            px_datanote                               
#>  DATANOTECELL        px_datanotecell                           
#>  DATANOTESUM         px_datanotesum                            
#>  DATASYMBOL1         px_datasymbol1                            
#>  DATASYMBOL2         px_datasymbol2                            
#>  DATASYMBOL3         px_datasymbol3                            
#>  DATASYMBOL4         px_datasymbol4                            
#>  DATASYMBOL5         px_datasymbol5                            
#>  DATASYMBOL6         px_datasymbol6                            
#>  DATASYMBOLNIL       px_datasymbolnil                          
#>  DATASYMBOLSUM       px_datasymbolsum                          
#>  DAYADJ              px_dayadj                                 
#>  DEFAULT-GRAPH       px_default_graph                          
#>  DIRECTORY-PATH      px_directory_path                         
#>  DOUBLECOLUMN        px_doublecolumn                           
#>  FIRST-PUBLISHED     px_first_published                        
#>  HIERARCHIES         px_hierarchies                            
#>  HIERARCHYLEVELS     px_hierarchylevels                        
#>  HIERARCHYLEVELSOPEN px_hierarchylevelsopen                    
#>  HIERARCHYNAMES      px_hierarchynames                         
#>  INFO                px_info                                   
#>  KEYS                px_keys                                   
#>  META-ID             px_meta_id                                
#>  OFFICIAL-STATISTICS px_official_statistics                    
#>  PARTITIONED         px_partitioned                            
#>  PRESTEXT            px_prestext                               
#>  PX-SERVER           px_px_server                              
#>  REFPERIOD           px_refperiod                              
#>  ROUNDING            px_rounding                               
#>  SEASADJ             px_seasadj                                
#>  SURVEY              px_survey                                 
#>  SYNONYMS            px_synonyms
```

Finally these 2 keywords will not have a modifying function, because
they are automatically determined by the data.

``` R
#>  Keyword     
#>  CODES       
#>  VARIABLECODE
```

## Need help?

If you have any questions or need help, feel free to [open an
issue](https://github.com/StatisticsGreenland/pxmake/issues/new) on
GitHub, or contact [Lars and
Johan](https://github.com/StatisticsGreenland/pxmake/graphs/contributors)
via email.

## For developers

### PX specification

pxmake is based on the [PX-file format specification on Statistics
Swedens
homepage](https://www.scb.se/globalassets/vara-tjanster/px-programmen/px-file_format_specification_2013.pdf).

### PxJob

Some tests cases uses
[PxJob](https://stat.fi/tup/tilastotietokannat/px-tuoteperhe_en.html).
Install [pxjob64Win](https://github.com/StatisticsGreenland/pxjob64Win)
to be able ro run these tests. This only works on Windows.

### How to create a new release

1.  Run `usethis::use_release_issue()` and follow checklist.
2.  Sync fork on [PxTools/pxmake](https://github.com/PxTools/pxmake).

# Package index

## Main function

- [`px()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px.md)
  : Create a px object

## Create files

- [`px_save()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_save.md)
  : Save px object to file
- [`px_save_classification()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_save_classification.md)
  : Save classification as .vs and .agg files

## Modify px object

Once a px object has been created, with
[`px()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px.md),
it can be modified with the functions below

### px Keywords

Modifying functions that match a specific px keyword.

- [`px_aggregallowed()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_aggregallowed.px.md)
  : AGGREGALLOWED
- [`px_autopen()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_autopen.px.md)
  : AUTOPEN
- [`px_axis_version()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_axis_version.px.md)
  : AXIS-VERSION
- [`px_baseperiod()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_baseperiod.px.md)
  : BASEPERIOD
- [`px_cellnote()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_cellnote.px.md)
  : CELLNOTE
- [`px_cellnotex()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_cellnotex.px.md)
  : CELLNOTEX
- [`px_cfprices()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_cfprices.px.md)
  : CFPRICES
- [`px_charset()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_charset.px.md)
  : CHARSET
- [`px_codepage()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_codepage.px.md)
  : CODEPAGE
- [`px_confidential()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_confidential.px.md)
  : CONFIDENTIAL
- [`px_contact()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_contact.px.md)
  : CONTACT
- [`px_contents()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_contents.px.md)
  : CONTENTS
- [`px_contvariable()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_contvariable.px.md)
  : CONTVARIABLE
- [`px_copyright()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_copyright.px.md)
  : COPYRIGHT
- [`px_creation_date()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_creation_date.px.md)
  : CREATION-DATE
- [`px_data()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_data.px.md)
  : DATA
- [`px_decimals()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_decimals.px.md)
  : DECIMALS
- [`px_description()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_description.px.md)
  : DESCRIPTION
- [`px_descriptiondefault()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_descriptiondefault.px.md)
  : DESCRIPTIONDEFAULT
- [`px_domain()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_domain.px.md)
  : DOMAIN
- [`px_elimination()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_elimination.px.md)
  : ELIMINATION
- [`px_heading()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_heading.px.md)
  : HEADING
- [`px_infofile()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_infofile.px.md)
  : INFOFILE
- [`px_language()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_language.px.md)
  : LANGUAGE
- [`px_languages()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_languages.px.md)
  : LANGUAGES
- [`px_last_updated()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_last_updated.px.md)
  : LAST-UPDATED
- [`px_link()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_link.px.md)
  : LINK
- [`px_map()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_map.px.md)
  : MAP
- [`px_matrix()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_matrix.px.md)
  : MATRIX
- [`px_next_update()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_next_update.px.md)
  : NEXT-UPDATE
- [`px_note()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_note.px.md)
  : NOTE
- [`px_notex()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_notex.px.md)
  : NOTEX
- [`px_precision()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_precision.px.md)
  : PRECISION
- [`px_showdecimals()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_showdecimals.px.md)
  : SHOWDECIMALS
- [`px_source()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_source.px.md)
  : SOURCE
- [`px_stockfa()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_stockfa.px.md)
  : STOCKFA
- [`px_stub()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_stub.px.md)
  : STUB
- [`px_subject_area()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_subject_area.px.md)
  : SUBJECT-AREA
- [`px_subject_code()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_subject_code.px.md)
  : SUBJECT-CODE
- [`px_tableid()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_tableid.px.md)
  : TABLEID
- [`px_timeval()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_timeval.px.md)
  : TIMEVAL
- [`px_title()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_title.px.md)
  : TITLE
- [`px_units()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_units.px.md)
  : UNITS
- [`px_update_frequency()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_update_frequency.px.md)
  : UPDATE-FREQUENCY
- [`px_valuenote()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_valuenote.px.md)
  : VALUENOTE
- [`px_valuenotex()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_valuenotex.px.md)
  : VALUENOTEX
- [`px_values()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_values.px.md)
  : VALUES
- [`px_variable_type()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_variable_type.px.md)
  : VARIABLE-TYPE

### Special modifying functions

Modifying functions that do not relate to a specific px keyword.

- [`px_add_totals()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_add_totals.px.md)
  : Add total levels to variables
- [`px_figures()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_figures.px.md)
  : Change figures variable
- [`px_order()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_order.px.md)
  : Change value order
- [`px_variable_label()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_variable_label.px.md)
  : Change VARIABLE-LABEL

## Special functions

- [`px_micro()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_micro.md)
  : Create micro PX-files
- [`px_validate()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_validate.md)
  : Check px object

## Collections (value set and aggregations)

- [`px_classification()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_classification.md)
  : Create a classification object
- [`px_save_classification()`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_save_classification.md)
  : Save classification as .vs and .agg files

## Built in datasets

- [`population_gl`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/population_gl.md)
  : Population Greenland
- [`greenlanders`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/greenlanders.md)
  : Greenlanders
- [`px_keywords`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/px_keywords.md)
  : px keywords
- [`age_classification`](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/reference/age_classification.md)
  : Age classification

  files](https://statisticsgreenland.github.io/pxmake/articles/micro-files.md):
